message: I love how the writing is at the same level as Arrested Development. Have to rewind at least twice a show
@ericflo good point. Probably not at the same level, but certainly aspires and tries to be. Its rapid-fire.
Yeah I'm a big fan of Modern Family right now, it's hilarious, not quite sure about if it's the same level as Arrested Development though
Yeah, Modern Family is one of my favorite shows. My girlfriend loves it too, which makes it so much better :-)

I don't think any show will come close to the number of layers AD had per episode, but I could definitely tell that Modern Family was trying to emulate that style from watching it briefly. Here's hoping it only continues to get better!
I'd say the closest to Arrested Development these days is 30 Rock, at least in terms of density of jokes/time.
@briand I really don't think it's as fast paced or jam packed as Arrested Development
Hey - yippee! New episode on tonight.
lmao! Tonight is so choice! Hahaha this is a great one!
@chrischen21 it isn't all the time. But when the do try to hit that pace, I think they pull it off. Must be difficult to keep that kind of pace up.
Finally can read this topic. I was avoiding it last night since I hadn't watched MF yet. T'was an awesome episode!
Modern Family relates to real people better than AD did ... not that I didn't love AD ...
phil has to be my favorite character
@kin On the fence on whether I like Phil or Cam more. Cam always has me laughing
both Phil and Clare are hilarious perfection together.
Luke is my favorite most of the time, the kid they picked to play him seems just about as dumb as the character he's trying to play.
I watched Modern Family last night and taped Human Target and watched it later. Just about fell OFL when Pucci talked about Mr. and Mrs. Ross.
